title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.21 - Hours during which freight handling service available
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.21 - Hours during which freight handling service available

State Regulations

The facilities of a truck terminal shall be available
to render service for the handling of freight 24 hour daily, except Saturdays, Sundays and holidays. If services are required on Saturdays, Sundays and
holidays, special arrangements therefor must be made with the Port Authority, on application to the superintendent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1225.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
